title: Travel Smarter with KudoSIM
subtitle: Stay connected anywhere in the world with our reliable eSIM service

coverage.title: 200+ destinations
coverage.description: No more switching SIMs, install it once, keep it forever

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Got questions? Our support team is here 24/7 via email or live chat to help you anytime, anywhere.

lounge.title: Free lounge access
lounge.description: Get lounge access if your flight delays, what a sweet deal!

bills.title: No more bill shocks
bills.description: Enjoy ultimate peace of mind and flexibility to top up anytime

enjoyingServices: Hope you are enjoying our services!

customize.title: Customize Your Plan
customize.description: Adjust your eSIM plan duration and data amount to match your travel. No more paying for unused days or running out early.

unlimited.title: Unlimited Data Plans
unlimited.description: Enjoy prepaid unlimited internet access in Kosovo. No top-ups, no worries â€” stay connected all day.

whatsapp.title: Keep Your WhatsApp Number
whatsapp.description: Call and message using your WhatsApp like you're at home. Stay in touch while abroad without changing numbers.

delivery.title: Immediate Delivery
delivery.description: Your eSIM is delivered instantly by email. Whether you're already abroad or packing your bags, connect in seconds.

sharing.title: Share Data with Family
sharing.description: Use up to 500MB/day to create a hotspot and share data with friends or family, anytime, on the go.
